commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor class Duke to Mira.
commitResults.messageBody:
This is to reflect the new chat bot name with new welcome messages.

Other files with word 'Duke' is replaced with 'Mira' as well.

commitResults.messageTitle: Create new class UI (User Interface)
commitResults.messageBody:
- readCommand, echoCommand, showMessage are related methods dealing
with user input and output

- the main logics of chatbot code remains on Mira class

commitResults.messageTitle: Create TaskList class
commitResults.messageBody: This handles addTask and listTask methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Reuse UI class in TaskList class
commitResults.messageBody:
Using UI class and methods for all user interactions, it provides
centralized control of the output styling such as printLine

commitResults.messageTitle: Create new Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
It is more natural to represent task in TaskList as class instead
of primitive values.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update TaskList to use Task class
commitResults.messageBody: markTask and unmarkTask methods are added in TaskList class

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Mira class with mark and unmark commands
Create subclass Deadline, Event, and Todo
commitResults.messageBody:
This is so that mentioned class contains shared Task methods, and
having differing behaviors via inheritance and polymorphism

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Mira class with new commands
commitResults.messageBody:
update addTask method with input Task to take advantage of
polymorphism

commitResults.messageTitle: Update input and output file for text UI testing
Replaced incorrect inputs message via Exceptions
Rewrite TaskList class with ArrayList implementation and add delete method
Make all subclasses of Task have toFileString method
commitResults.messageBody:
toFileString method returns a formatted string to be used for saving
of tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Storage class
commitResults.messageBody:
Given a relative file path, the Storage class can save and load
tasks in specified string format

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Mira and TaskList class to save tasks in disk automatically whenever the task list changes
commitResults.messageBody:
saveTask method used in creation of new task where content is
written in append mode

saveTasks method used for update and delete of existing task where
content is overwritten

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Use LocalDateTime for datetime of Event and Deadline tasks
Merge branch 'branch-Level-8'
Rename class UI to Ui
Add Parser, ExitCommand, ListCommand classes
Add MarkCommand, UnmarkCommand, DeleteCommand and TodoCommand class
Add EventCommand and DeadlineCommand
Refactor Mira constructor to handle exception internally
Add JavaDoc comments to all Command classes and Savable interface
Merge branch 'branch-A-MoreOOP'
Move Command and its subclasses into mira.command package, the rest is in mira package
